mdRecord.dcterms:title: The civil law in its natural order: together with the publick law / written in French by Monsieur Domat, the late French king's advocate in the Presidial Court of Clermont in France: and translated into English by William Strahan, LL. D. advocate in Doctors Commons ; with additional remarks on some material differences between the civil law and the law of England ; in two volumes
Domat, Jean, 1625-1696. Lois civiles dans leur ordre naturel. English

mdRecord.dcterms:description: In this second edition, v. 1 ends on p.670 and the last numbered page in v. 2 is p.676 [i.e. 706], p. 700-706 being misnumbered 670-676; after p. 676 comes the unpaginated index.
